item.title: Jack Stauber - Buttercup
item.description:
Buttercup by Jack Stauber, with lyrics. Chords used: Gmaj7 & F sharp minor. For educational use. The chords for the intro and outro have been intentionally omitted to make it easier to play. The Gmaj7 could be replaced with a regular G chord. The F sharp minor chord is the same shape as a G7, just played on strings 2, 3, and 4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Francesca Battistelli - Heaven Everywhere - Baritone Ukulele - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: G, G6, Gmaj7, C, D, Em7, Em
As performed by Francesca Battistelli
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pH-GE0UeO9A
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at:
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. Chords used: G, Gmaj7, G7, C, Cm, C#dim, D7, E7, Dmaj7, Em, Gaug, Em6, Am7, Cm6, D7sus4

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7

item.title: Ariana Grande - Santa Tell Me - Key of G
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Christmas
Santa Tell Me - Ariana Grande Written by Ariana Grande, Ilya Salmanzadeh and Savan Kotecha
Using the chords: A B7 Bm C D Em G G7 Gmaj7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQxNRbyi3i4Nvqpo55bWBkg T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Queen Naija - Butterflies - Key of G
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Butterflies on the ukulele by The Queen Naija. The chords used are Gmaj7 Dmaj7 Em7 F#m.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Gypsy Kings - Bamboleo - Key of Em
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Bamboleo on the ukulele by The Gypsy Kings. The chords used are Em C D7 Bb Gmaj7 Am Am7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Memphis Ukulele Band - Merry Christmas Broken Hearts - Baritone Ukulele - Key of D
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of D.
As performed by The Memphis Ukulele Band. A new release for December 2018! Special thanks to the Memphis Ukulele Band for allowing me to make a play along of this song!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.
